import math
for i in range(input()):
    a=map(int,raw_input().split())
    n=input()
    a.sort()
    c=a[-n]
    index=[i for i, x in enumerate(a) if x == c]
    max_c=len(index)
    t=math.factorial(max_c)
    d=11-n
    index = [i for i, x in enumerate(index) if x>=d]
    min_c=len(index)
    y=math.factorial(min_c)
    z=math.factorial(max_c-min_c)
    ans=t/(y*z)
    print ans
